trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Arlington
There were no other sightings in Arlington on or around August 10th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was traveling via airplane from Washington DC to Memphis, TN and since I was seated at a window I decided to take some random photos with my Iphone. In inspecting the pictures I found some anomolies that could be UFOs in three of the pictures. I realize that since I was shooting from inside the window, they could be some kind of reflections from inside the aircraft, but they don't really appear that way to me and I did not notice any reflections at the time of the photographs. One of the photos included was taken at the same time and does not show the possible objects. I would appreciate a second opinion. Thanks.
Summary: Taking pictures from aircraft window, later saw images.
